ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to acknowledge funding from World Health Organization/Tropical Disease Research. We would also like to thank the Ntalale community. We would also like to acknowledge the contributions, reviewers and the editorial team.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no financial or personal relationships that may have inappropriately influenced them in writing this article.

sec.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
sec.p: A.M. conceptualised the study, carried out the field work and wrote the manuscript. M.J.C. contributed to the conceptualisation of the proposal, data analysis and write-up of the manuscript. S.M. conceptualised the research concept, guided data collection and contributed to the manuscript writing.
